page.title: 03LAND MARKS IN BEECHES AREA
page.content: We have identified some old landmarks and found out what they are now. 1.Egypt-so called because people used to call gypsies "Egyptians".Now the lane is called "Egypt lane"because gypsies camped there. 2.Old Quarry-Now called "The Dell"it looks like a quarry and is now used for BMX(bicycle motorcross)riding there is also a cafe there. 3."The Stag"-Is a public house,it has stood for more than a hundred years. It was rebuilt on the old foundations on Stag Hill.It is decorated by car horns,wheels,lamps and other car pieces from the early days of motoring. 4.Hardicanutes Moat-was once a Saxon encampment,also known as Harlequin's moat.It encloses about twenty acres. 5.Old Gravel pit-it is still there deep with steep sides.
